column5: Beautiful home with rim views and pool. Minutes from shopping and freeways but feels like you're miles from civilization. Easy-going empty-nesters would be proud to host you. Full kitchen privileges. No pets please, we already have two friendly dogs! Check in after 8 PM, $20 additional fee. To assure a private bathroom check \
column8: 20 mins to Riverwalk, Bdrm A, Pool!
